snippet.title: Kuchar rallies, chips in for RBC Heritage win
snippet.description: Matt Kuchar saw his well-struck 5-iron on the 18th hole at the RBC Heritage come up way short of the target and settle in a front bunker.

snippet.title: Kuchar rallies from 4 back to win RBC Heritage
snippet.description: Matt Kuchar saw his well-struck 5-iron on the 18th hole at the RBC Heritage come up way short of the target and settle in a front bunker.

snippet.title: California farmers to get more water
snippet.description: California farmers to get more water; state, federal officials ease drought-related cutbacks

snippet.title: SpaceX making Easter delivery of station supplies
snippet.description: A SpaceX supply ship rocketed toward the International Space Station on Friday, setting the stage for an Easter morning delivery and urgent spacewalking repairs later in the week.

snippet.title: SpaceX making Easter delivery of station supplies
snippet.description: A SpaceX supply ship rocketed toward the International Space Station on Friday, setting the stage for an Easter morning delivery and urgent spacewalking repairs later in the week.

snippet.title: California farmers to get more water
snippet.description: Drought-stricken California farmers and cities are set to get more water as state and federal officials ease cutbacks due to recent rain and snow, officials announced on Friday.

snippet.title: Ukraine, short on military budget, starts fundraising drive
snippet.description: With empty treasury, few bullet-proof vests, citizens open their wallets.

snippet.title: SpaceX rocket to make Easter delivery of supplies to International Space Station
snippet.description: SpaceX making Easter morning delivery of space station supplies, Fri. launch after month delay

snippet.title: The fracking divide: Mexico's oil frontier beckons U.S. drillers in wake of new law
snippet.description: With new energy law, Mexico beckons with the mother lode next door
